objects.name: Analytic 1637
objects.description: Detects adversary abuse of SaaS platform vulnerabilities to bypass logging, monitoring, or consent boundaries. Defender perspective focuses on abnormal application integration events, missing audit logs, or API calls from unauthorized service principals that align with exploitation attempts.
